Title: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver
Writer: Dirk Ahner, Andrew Birkin, Michael Ende (novel), James V. Hart, Sebastian Niemann
Actors: Shirley MacLaine, Michael Herbig, Henning Baum, Milan Peschel
Plot: An orphan boy in search of his origin. A young princess held prisoner in deadly Dragon City. Jim and his friend Luke discovering mysterious lands on the quest of a lifetime.
